title: Add female voice narration and enhanced visuals to boot sequence

requirements.text: Add female text-to-speech voice narration to the boot sequence that speaks the following script: "Hello welcome to the H.E.V mark prototype protective systems. Initialization procedures active. Comms. Active. Advanced medical systems. Active. Advanced weaponry systems engaged. Vital signs Activated. Tactical engagement systems Activated. Environmental hazard and informational tabs Activated. Power and health monitoring systems Activated. Boot up sequence finished. Have a very safe day."

quotes: Can you add a voice during startup?
make the voice female and make it say "hello welcome to the H.E.V mark prototype protective systems..."

acceptanceCriteria: Female voice plays automatically during boot sequence
Voice narration matches the provided script exactly
Voice playback is synchronized with boot sequence stages
Voice respects the existing voiceEnabled setting from infoSettingsState

requirements.text: Enhance the boot sequence visuals in BootSequenceOverlay.tsx to be more informative and visually engaging, displaying system initialization stages with corresponding status indicators, progress bars, or animated elements that correlate with each voice announcement

quotes: make the boot up sequence have way cooler and informative visuals

acceptanceCriteria: Boot sequence displays distinct visual stages for each system initialization step
Visual elements animate smoothly and provide clear feedback about initialization progress
Visuals are synchronized with voice narration timing
Enhanced visuals maintain consistency with existing HUD aesthetic and color scheme
Boot sequence remains performant and does not cause layout shifts or visual glitches

constraints: Voice narration must respect the existing voiceEnabled setting in infoSettingsState
Boot sequence enhancements must work within the existing BootSequenceOverlay.tsx component structure
Audio playback must integrate with existing audioBus.ts system
nonGoals: Creating new audio settings beyond existing voiceEnabled toggle
Changing the overall HUD theme or color scheme
Adding voice alerts outside of the boot sequence
